titleStmt.title: Whereas an ordinance was lately made by both houses of Parliament, for the speedy supply of the cities of London and Westminster with the places and parishes adjoyning, within the line of communication and bils of mortality, with wood for fuell within threescore miles compasse of the said cities.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Title from first six lines of text.
"It is ordered by the committee of Lords and Commons, that this order be printed..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
